title: 4-Year-Old Child Shot in Yonkers
content:
A 4-year-old child was shot at a home in Yonkers Saturday, police say.
The child was taken to a hospital in stable condition after the shooting on Willow Street. It wasn't clear if the child was shot inside the home or was outside at the time of the shooting.
According to a witness, multiple shots may have been fired. The witness said it appeared the child may have been hit by a stray bullet.
The child is expected to survive.
No arrests have been made.
